message.body: Did you hear back from school? I know a lot of people are finding out!
I still have to finish the application. I am a procrastinator.
Oh it's due so late
Well you should finish!
I don't think I'd be able to go in the fall anyway. It feels too sudden. I was planning on the spring. Or maybe that's just more procrastinatin'.
Well whatever works for you. Probably nothing wrong with procrastinating. Big move.
But then again if you are going to do it! Just do it face first (after a glass of Brandy)
I'm going for it. (I had a couple glasses of wine instead). Part of doing this is that I feel like I need to take a chance on something. Big moves are scary but getting trapped scares me more.

Getting trapped is scary. Mike a classmate of mine from taiwan sent me this: "Sofie, when I was in junior high school, a teacher told me, if you feel good, that means you're going down; if you feel you're struggling, it means you're going up. It's like climbing a mountain."
I think scary is good. Forces you to problem solve. And nothing can really screw you up that bad...
Right?
That's really good advice.
Yeah but that girl is crazy and not in a good way.
I just feel like I need to take more risks and have adventures and not always do what's safe and easy.
Well risk taking is good. Boston and school seems like a smart move for you. But you could prob take risks in Philly too.
Thanks for your encouragement last night. You're really awesome.
ï¿¼
Awwwww
Do you get to pet them
Or feed them
Or read them!!!
Ride!! Not read
They are pretty. That's their home. Red barn.
The cowboys told my housemate they want people to ride them so they get exercise.
Are they real cowboys?
Do you know how to ride
No. I never rode a horse before. Do you?
I rode horses for a summer. My parents said it was too expensive for me to continue!! I was sad! Riding horses is awesome.
I rode this beginner horse named Reggie he was huge. I also had cool leather chaps.
It's really fun but kind if dangerous.
I love it! You should ride them.
I want to. Maybe this summer ill get to.
Go tomorrow !!!
Steal them and ride them to boston
Ill take them. Instead of getting puppies.
That would really be an adventure. The cowboys might come after me.
Are they really cowboys. What are cowboys doing in Philly
They are old guys who dress like cowboys. I think they call themselves the western cowboys club of philadelphia.
Awww man
Well you should ride them.
ASAP
